definitions.definition: A multicoloured arch in the sky , produced by prismatic refraction of light within droplets of rain in the air .
Any prismatic refraction of light showing a spectrum of colours .
A wide assortment ; a varied multitude .

examples: Many electoral promises are rainbows , vanishing soon after poll day.

definitions.definition: A curveball , particularly a slow one.
A trick in which the player makes the ball arc over the opponent's head using both feet ; rainbow kick
In Texas hold 'em or Omaha hold 'em , a flop that contains three different suits .
A person within the LGBT community.
examples: Oh look, the rainbow came back.

main_definition: A multicoloured arch in the sky , produced by prismatic refraction of light within droplets of rain in the air .
secondary_definitions: Any prismatic refraction of light showing a spectrum of colours .
( often used with “of” ) A wide assortment ; a varied multitude .
( baseball ) A curveball , particularly a slow one.
( soccer ) A trick in which the player makes the ball arc over the opponent's head using both feet ; rainbow kick
( poker slang ) In Texas hold 'em or Omaha hold 'em , a flop that contains three different suits .
( figuratively , sometimes derogatory ) A person within the LGBT community.
